Comment.Language: Following the reading of the Praxis, the hymn "Blessed is He (Eulogimenoc)" is chanted:

Title.Language: He Who Sits Upon the Cherubim

Text.Language: A Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: kata v~r/] m~paie~hoou: afse e~qoun e~Ieroucal/m: eftal/out e~oue~w~.
Our Lord Jesus Christ, according to this day, entered into Jerusalem, riding on a donkey.
